build_preview.desc1: Al momento stai visualizzando una versione di anteprima di Elk dalla community - {0}.
build_preview.desc2: Potrebbe contenere modifiche non riviste o addirittura dannose.
build_preview.desc3: Non accedere con il tuo account reale.
build_preview.title: Anteprima della distribuzione

help.desc_highlight: Aspettatevi alcuni bug e funzionalità mancanti qua e là.
help.desc_para1: Grazie per il tuo interesse nel provare Elk, il nostro client web Mastodon in fase di sviluppo!
help.desc_para2: stiamo lavorando duramente allo sviluppo e migliorandolo nel tempo.
help.desc_para3: Per potenziare lo sviluppo, puoi sponsorizzare il Team tramite GitHub Sponsors. Ci auguriamo che Elk ti piaccia!
help.desc_para4: Elk è Open Source. Se desideri aiutare con i test, fornire feedback o contribuire,
help.title: Elk è in anteprima!

list.error: Si è verificato un errore durante la creazione dell'elenco

about.label: About

about.sponsors_body_1: Elk is made possible thanks the generous sponsoring and help of:
about.sponsors_body_2: And all the companies and individuals sponsoring Elk Team and the members.
about.sponsors_body_3: If you're enjoying the app, consider sponsoring us:

account_settings.description: Edit your account settings in Mastodon UI
account_settings.label: Account settings

push_notifications.description: Receive notifications even when you are not using Elk.
push_notifications.instructions: Don't forget to save your changes using @:settings.notifications.push_notifications.save_settings button!
push_notifications.label: Push notifications settings

policy.title: Who can I receive notifications from?

subscription_error.error_hint: You can consult a list of frequently asked questions to try to solve the problem: {0}.
subscription_error.invalid_vapid_key: The VAPID public key seems to be invalid.
subscription_error.permission_denied: Permission denied: enable notifications in your browser.
subscription_error.request_error: An error occurred while requesting the subscription, try again and if the error persists, please report the issue to the Elk repository.
subscription_error.title: Could not subscribe to push notifications
subscription_error.too_many_registrations: Due to browser limitations, Elk cannot use the push notifications service for multiple accounts on different servers. You should unsubscribe from push notifications on another account and try again.
subscription_error.vapid_not_supported: Your browser supports Web Push Notifications, but does not seem to implement the VAPID protocol.

push_notifications.title: Push notifications settings
push_notifications.unsupported: Your browser does not support push notifications.

warning.enable_description: To receive notifications when Elk is not open, enable push notifications. You can control precisely what types of interactions generate push notifications via the "@:settings.notifications.show_btn{'"'} button above once enabled.
warning.enable_description_desktop: To receive notifications when Elk is not open, enable push notifications. You can control precisely what types of interactions generate push notifications in "Settings > Notifications > Push notifications settings" once enabled.
warning.enable_description_mobile: You can also access the settings using the navigation menu "Settings > Notifications > Push notification settings".
warning.enable_description_settings: To receive notifications when Elk is not open, enable push notifications. You will be able to control precisely what types of interactions generate push notifications on this same screen once you enable them.
warning.re_auth: It seems that your server does not support push notifications. Try sign out and sign in again, if this message still appears contact your server administrator.

preferences.enable_data_saving_description: Save data by preventing attachments from automatically loading.
preferences.hide_username_emojis_description: Hides emojis from usernames in timelines. Emojis will still be visible in their profiles.
preferences.label: Preferences
preferences.title: Experimental Features

appearance.label: Appearance

featured_tags.description: People can browse your public posts under these hashtags.

share-target.description: Elk can be configured so that you can share content from other applications, simply install Elk on your device or computer and sign in.
share-target.hint: In order to share content with Elk, Elk must be installed and you must be signed in.
share-target.title: Share with Elk
